text:
[Verse]
Moonlight lights the way
Stars above they sway
Feel the rhythm play
Night turns into day

[Verse 2]
Feet upon the ground
Heartbeat pounding loud
Lost in the sound
Dancing with the crowd

[Chorus]
Round and round we go
In the midnight glow
Let the energy flow
We'll never slow

[Verse 3]
Echoes in the night
Everything feels right
Underneath the light
Holding on so tight

[Bridge]
Shadows start to creep
Dreams are what we keep
Even as we leap
Into the deep

[Chorus]
Round and round we go
In the midnight glow
Let the energy flow
We'll never slow
title: Midnight Dance
